name: CODENAME: SPROUT
description:
CODENAME: SPROUT is LDJAM46 entry, made in 72 hours with the theme "Keep it alive". Goal is to keep both the research and the alien alive, balancing between the welfare of the alien and the research budget.

Team
  • Antti Koponen (Game Design, Programming, SFX, Animation, UI Art)
  • NANIkisunami (Art)

⌨️ (Optional) Press F1 for instant dialogue.

LDJAM PAGE: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/codename-sprout
